parameters.name: originationNumberId
parameters.description: The ID of the Origination Phone number you want to use.  Can be found in the End User Messaging SMS console.

parameters.name: viteIssuerUrl
parameters.description: Issuer URL deployed from TVM (Token Vending Machine) solution.  Can be found in the Cloudformation stack output as 'IssuerUrlOutput'.

parameters.name: viteIAMAssumeRoleARN
parameters.description: IAM assume role ARN deployed from TVM (Token Vending Machine) solution.  Can be found in the Cloudformation stack output as 'QBizAssumeRoleARN'.

parameters.name: qBusinessApplicationId
parameters.description: Application ID of Amazon Q Business application.  Can be found in the Q Business console.
